verses.roman:
caitanya-caritra ei amṛtera sindhu
karṇa-mana tṛpta kare yāra eka bindu

synonyms: caitanya-caritra—the life and characteristics of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ei—this; amṛtera sindhu—the ocean of nectar; karṇa—ear; mana—mind; tṛpta kare—pleases; yāra—of which; eka—one; bindu—drop.
translation: The life and characteristics of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu are exactly like an ocean of nectar, one drop of which can please the mind and ear.
